name: ESP Capital
description:
ESP Capital is an early stage venture capital fund operating in Vietnam and South East Asia.  Focusing on tech startups, we aim to invest in companies that can create profound impact to improve life qualities. 
Our strategy is to develop a complete ecosystem around the millennial's lives, including education, career development, real-estate, healthcare, entertainment, etc.
 
ESP Capital currently has $20 million under management, with investments in 14 companies in Vietnam and Singapore. From the first day throughout the growth phase, we are committed to offering our unique insights to support exceptional teams and strengthen their competency, with the goal of growing them into the next Unicorns.
